parse: Noun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Peter, a Greek name meaning rock. Apparently a primary word; a rock; as a name, Petrus, an apostle.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From epi and strepho; to revert.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.

parse: Article - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Noun - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: A learner, disciple, pupil. From manthano; a learner, i.e. Pupil.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Noun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Of Hebrew origin; Jesus, the name of our Lord and two other Israelites.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To love, wish well to, take pleasure in, long for; denotes the love of reason, esteem. Perhaps from agan; to love.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: To accompany, attend, follow. Properly, to be in the same way with, i.e. To accompany.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From ana and pipto; to fall back, i.e. Lie down, lean back.

parse: Noun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: The breast, chest. From histemi; the bosom, i.e. Chest.

parse: Preposition
str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Article - Dative Neuter Singular
str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Noun - Dative Neuter Singular
str2: A dinner, an afternoon or evening meal. From the same as dapane; dinner, i.e. The chief meal.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Noun - Vocative Masculine Singular
str2: Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From para and didomi; to surrender, i.e yield up, intrust, transmit.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
